LoggingFormatterExtension - Class in org.concordion.ext
Formats the footer of the Concordion specification to show a link to the log file that has been created for this test.

By default this link leads to a log file viewer which attempts to format the log file for easier reading.
LoggingFormatterExtension() - Constructor for class org.concordion.ext.LoggingFormatterExtension
 
LoggingFormatterExtension(boolean) - Constructor for class org.concordion.ext.LoggingFormatterExtension
